lead_paragraph: Scott M. Stringer, the New York City comptroller, issued a second straight D-plus for agencies citywide in his third annual report on procurement with minority-owned businesses.

headline.print_headline: Stringer Faults de Blasio Again as 2017 Race Nears
headline.main: Stringer Faults Mayor de Blasio Again as 2017 Race Nears

snippet: Scott M. Stringer, the New York City comptroller, issued a second straight D-plus for agencies citywide in his third annual report on procurement with minority-owned businesses....
abstract: New York City Comptroller Scott M Stringer delivers annual report on city procurement with minority-owned businesses, which gives agencies citywide subpar performance grades; denies that politics do not impact grades, despite his evident interest in 2017 mayoral campaign and repeated focus on deficiencies in Mayor Bill de Blasio's administration.
